title: Anonymous FTP
description:
An FTP server at 192.168.1.100 allows anonymous login. You connect and list files:

$ ftp 192.168.1.100
Name: anonymous
Password: (anything)
230 Login successful.
ftp> ls /pub/documents
-rw-r--r-- 1 ftp ftp   1024 Jan 10 2026 readme.txt
-rw-r--r-- 1 ftp ftp   2048 Jan 10 2026 secret_memo.txt
-rw-r--r-- 1 ftp ftp    512 Jan 10 2026 todo.txt

Which file most likely contains sensitive information?

Submit as: flag{filename}
hints: Look for filenames that suggest sensitive content
A file named 'secret_memo' stands out among readme and todo files
Always check files with 'secret', 'password', 'config', 'backup' in their names
